subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Cadel Evans of Australia, who is second, and Alberto Contador of Spain, who is sixth, cut into Thomas Voeckler’s lead in the Tour de France, and Stage 16 went to Thor Hushovd of Norway.
snippet: Cadel Evans of Australia, who is second, and Alberto Contador of Spain, who is sixth, cut into Thomas Voeckler’s lead in the Tour de France, and Stage 16 went to Thor Hushovd of Norway.
